fields.value: Introduction on Nanotechnology and Carbon Nano Tubes to Reduce Air Pollution on Large Scale Emissions and Strategic Analysis of Climate Change

dsDescriptionValue.value: Air Pollution is one of the major problems that are not only hard to overcome; but also it’s becoming overwhelming to humans and other living beings. Contamination of air depends on different factors such as burning of fossil fuels (coal, oil, natural gas, gasoline, etc.) and also one of the vital aspects is emissions from vehicles that only increase day by day unless we are using electric cars or water powered vehicles. This paper shows rough information to reduce air pollution through nanotechnology and strategically analysis of the climate change in the span of eighty to hundred years. Although, there are various ways to reduce air pollution but the basic concept remains same, that is, to separate specific elements and molecules from a mixture of atoms and molecules in the atmosphere at molecular level.

keywordValue.value: Nanotechnology; Carbon nano tubes; Air pollution; Environment; Emissions; Climate change

publicationCitation.value: Mitra M (2018) Introduction on Nanotechnology and Carbon Nano Tubes to Reduce Air Pollution on Large Scale Emissions and Strategic Analysis of Climate Change. Int Rob Auto J 4(1): 00094. DOI: 10.15406/iratj.2018.04.00094
